ID_explanation: Batch of individuals sexed together on one 96-well plate; used to link sex information with individual entries in data files; = group of individuals tested for multiple assays
Batch of assays performed at a given time (i.e., a set of tests started on one occassion); number of batched with given ID must <= number of units available
Set of plates tested together (i.e., sexed together and handled together during one session (e.g., before noon or after noon) of testing; likely spurious (should mean the same as Individuals_ID)
